name: Rogue Souls V2
description:
A rogue-like action adventure game inspired by the Souls Series, available on windows and mac.

Fight your way through 3 levels of tough enemies and bosses, find new gear and spells with special attacks. Team up with your friends with online multiplayer!

Controls:

WASD - Move

LMB - Primary weapon

RMB - Secondary weapon

Q - Spell 1

E - Spell 2

R - Heal

Space - Dash

Esc - Open inventory

F - Interact

Multiplayer - The host must enable port forwarding to port 7777 on their router for clients to connect.
